Hero.Name: Samia
Hero.Description: Computer Engineering Student at NNU. Building digital experiences through Frontend Development.

About.desc1: I am a final-year Computer Engineering student at An-Najah National University. My journey started with a curiosity for how things work under the hood, which evolved into a passion for creating seamless, user-centric digital products.
About.desc2: I don't just write code; I build systems. My engineering background allows me to approach Frontend development with a focus on optimization, scalability, and clean architecture.

coreStrengths.title: Modern Frontend
coreStrengths.desc: Learning and exploring React and Next.js to build modern web applications.

coreStrengths.title: Computer Engineering
coreStrengths.desc: Applying hardware-level logic and efficiency to software solutions.

projects.title: Fashion Shop Database Project
projects.description: Educational MySQL project simulating a fashion e-commerce backend with users, products, orders, and payments.

projects.title: Student Collaboration Web
projects.description: Web app for students to share slides, tools, and questions, simplifying academic collaboration.

projects.title: HopeConnect API
projects.description: HopeConnect is a backend API connecting orphans in Gaza with donors, sponsors, volunteers, and orphanages.

projects.title: Simulated Annealing for Graph Coloring
projects.description: A GUI-based project using Simulated Annealing to solve the Graph Coloring Problem efficiently.

projects.title: Sweet Management System
projects.description: A software system to streamline operations and manage products, inventory, and sales for sweet shops.

projects.title: InvoLinker
projects.description: A web and mobile application to simplify and streamline invoice and purchase order management, reducing manual errors and improving workflow efficiency.

contact.title: Let’s build something together
contact.description: I’m always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your vision.
contact.readyDescription: Click the button below to send me an email.
